channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report E-2025030035
item.description:
Report E-2025030035

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: WAYCROSS
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: CSX CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 75000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: On 2-24-25 at 0408 personnel in the CSXT Rice Yard discovered SHPX 455351, a loaded hopper car of Ammonium Nitrate had collided with SHLX 359 a loaded tank car of Molten Sulfur. The result was the first hopper compartment of SHPX 455351 had failed and released product. Marion Environmental, a CSXT emergency response contractor, was dispatched to the scene to remove spilled lading.
